text: Hey Jill, how are you doing?
Hi Richard! I've been pretty good - super busy with work.
ahh that's good, you know what they say, work hard play hard.
I was wondering if you still had that cottage up in the muskokas?
Yeah I do, my family was going to head up there this weekend for a little getaway, but if you're looking to rent it out from us, we could find a time in august.
That's amazing, thanks for being so generous. What price are you looking for if we stay for a week?
Hmmm, that's not something I can really say. I'll have to check with my husband.
That sounds great, please don't say anything to Mary, this is kinda a secret getaway.
Wow, great idea! She's gonna love it.
I will keep my lips sealed!
Okay great, I'll send you a message later on this week.
